column1: Kata Robata////So the rising sun roll.. uh.. I wasn't impressed. The peppercorn tuna really gave a kick
column3: that I couldn't really enjoy it. I thought the peppercorn was too much
column4: but it wasn't terrible! I enjoyed tasting it
column5: but not eating it all.. if that makes sense. The tuna had a nice texture to it
column7: but I just didn't prefer this.
